MG-43 Machine Gun.description: A machine gun designed for stationary use. Trades higher power for increased recoil and reduced accuracy.

AC-8 Autocannon.description: A fully-automatic cannon effective against light vehicle armor. Includes support backpack required for reloading.

RS-422 Railgun.description: An experimental weapon which prioritizes armor penetration. Must be charged between shots - so choose targets carefully.

GR-8 Recoilless Rifle.description: A recoilless rifle effective against vehicle armor. Includes support backpack required for reloading.

APW-1 Anti-Materiel Rifle.description: A high-caliber sniper rifle effective over long distances against light vehicle armor. This rifle must be aimed downscope.

EAT-17 Expendable Anti-Tank.description: A single-use weapon specialized for damaging vehicle armor. Discarded after every use.

MLS-4X Commando.description: An expendable missile launcher equipped with four laser-guided missiles.

FLAM-40 Flamethrower.description: An incendiary weapon for close range. Will ignite targets, terrain, and any flammable teammates.

MG-206 Heavy Machine Gun.description: A very powerful but difficult-to-wield machine gun with intense recoil.

M-105 Stalwart.description: A compact, low caliber machine gun. Trades power for ease of use, with faster reloading than heavier machine guns.

RL-77 Airburst Rocket Launcher.description: Fires a rocket that detonates within proximity of a target, and deploys a cluster of explosive bomblets.

FAF-14 Spear.description: An anti-tank homing missile which must lock onto its target before launch. Effective against large and armored enemies.

StA-X3 W.A.S.P. Launcher.description:
A versatile missile launcher loaded with seven lock-on homing missiles. These can either be fired from the launcher directly or as an airburst. Includes support backpack required for reloading.
Produced by Stål Arms.

Orbital Gatling Barrage.description: A barrage of high explosive rounds, fired from the Destroyer's high speed rotary autocannons.

Orbital Airburst Strike.description: A projectile which explodes while airborne, creating a deadly rain of shrapnel. Not effective against heavy armor.

Orbital 120mm HE Barrage.description: A precision artillery salvo over a small area, perfect for taking out concentrated enemy units.

Orbital Napalm Barrage.description: Launches a prolonged barrage of napalm shells over a wide area, setting a swath of land ablaze in mere moments.

Orbital 380mm HE Barrage.description: A prolonged barrage, wreaking extended destruction over a large area. Communication with teammates is advised.

Orbital Walking Barrage.description: A linear artillery barrage which moves at intervals, driving the enemy out from cover while allowing an advance.

Orbital Laser.description: The Destroyer's laser cannon will sweep over the designated area, vaporizing all targets within the effective radius.

Orbital Railcannon Strike.description: A high-velocity railcannon round fired at the largest target in close proximity to the beacon. Targeting is automatic.

Lift-850 Jump Pack.description: Enables the user to jump higher than 'gravity' and 'safety' would normally allow. Must be charged before use.

Eagle Strafing Run.description: A strafing run of the battlefield to clear small targets, delivered almost instantly.

Eagle 500kg Bomb.description: A large bomb obliterating almost any target close to impact. Make sure to clear the area.

Eagle 110mm Rocket Pods.description: A barrage of rocket pods, which the Eagle pilot will release on the largest target near the stratagem beacon.

Eagle Airstrike.description: A barrage of bombs creating a non-targeted carpet of explosions.

Eagle Napalm Airstrike.description: A barrage of napalm bombs, creating a wall of fire which will stop the enemy in their tracks.

Eagle Smoke Strike.description: A barrage of smoke grenades, creating a thick smoke screen to block enemies' line of sight.

M-102 Fast Recon Vehicle.description: A lightly-armored reconnaissance vehicle mounted with a heavy machinegun.

E/GL-21 Grenadier Battlement.description: A stationary ballistic cover with a mounted grenade launcher. Can protect multiple Helldivers from small arms fire.

E/MG-101 HMG Emplacement.description: A manned gun emplacement offering superior firepower against lightly armored targets. Slow to turn, so place it wisely.

Orbital Precision Strike.description: A single precision shot from the Destroyer's 'ATLAS' cannon.

Orbital Gas Strike.description: A projectile which releases a cloud of caustic gas, blinding and slowing most enemies.

Orbital Smoke Strike.description: Creates a large, thick smoke screen to block targets' line of sight.

Orbital EMS Strike.description: A "compliance weapon" to modify enemy behavior. The projectile temporarily stuns all targets within the strike radius.

B-1 Supply Pack.description: Supply boxes containing ammunition, with a backpack that allows the user to distribute boxes to fellow Helldivers.

SH-20 Ballistic Shield Backpack.description: A backpack which can be wielded as a one-handed ballistic shield, protecting against small arms fire.

SH-32 Shield Generator Pack.description: A stationary energy shield which provides cover against projectiles. Has a limited lifetime once deployed.

AX/LAS-5 \"Guard Dog\" Rover.description: An autonomous drone equipped with a laser rifle, providing 360° cover. Returns to backpack to cool down.

MD-6 Anti-Personnel Minefield.description: Deploys a defensive anti-personnel minefield, to halt enemy advance.

MD-14 Incendiary Mines.description: Deploys a defensive incendiary minefield, which will set both terrain and targets alight when triggered.

MD-17 Anti-Tank Mines.description: Scatters powerful anti-tank mines that deal heavy, armor-penetrating damage. Minefield is less densely packed relative to smaller mines.

MD-8 Gas Mines.description: Deploys mines that release gas on activation, temporarily blinding and slowing most enemies.

Arc-3 Arc Thrower.description: Projects an arc of lightning at close range. Charges up to project bolts, and may discharge through multiple targets.

GL-21 Grenade Launcher.description: A grenade launcher effective against armored infantry. Not intended for use against vehicle armor or fortified buildings.

LAS-98 Laser Cannon.description: A laser weapon firing a continuous beam. Doesn't require ammunition, but will need heat sink replaced if it overheats.

LAS-99 Quasar Cannon.description: Charges up to fire a powerful, explosive energy burst. Has a long cooldown period after firing.

AX/AR-23 \"Guard Dog\".description: An autonomous drone equipped with a Liberator assault rifle, providing 360° cover. Returns to backpack to rearm.

EXO-45 Patriot Exosuit.description: A heavily-armored walking exosuit equipped with a rocket launcher and a heavy machine gun.

A/MLS-4X Rocket Sentry.description: A powerful automated turret, effective against armored targets. The turret will primarily aim at larger enemies.

A/MG-43 Machine Gun Sentry.description: An agile automated machine gun turret. Will fire at targets even if Helldivers will be caught in the crossfire.

A/G-16 Gatling Sentry.description: An automated turret with an extremely high rate of fire. Caution: does not check if friendly units are in line of fire.

A/M-12 Mortar Sentry.description: A turret firing powerful shells in a high arc. Effective at long ranges, and able to strike at targets behind cover.

A/M-23 EMS Mortar Sentry.description: A turret firing static field generators that slow the advance of enemies.

A/AC-8 Autocannon Sentry.description: An automated cannon turret firing anti-tank ammunition over long ranges. Sacrifices agility for range and power.

EXO-49 Emancipator Exosuit.description: A heavily-armored walking exosuit equipped with dual autocannons.

SH-51 Directional Shield.description: A one-handed device that deploys a wide energy barrier in front of the user. The barrier is semipermeable and blocks high-speed projectiles from the outside only, leaving the user free to shoot through it.

AX/TX-13 \"Guard Dog\" Dog Breath.description: A drone that defends its user by firing caustic gas at nearby enemies, blinding and slowing them temporarily. Returns to backpack to refill.

B-100 Portable Hellbomb.description: A backpack-mounted Hellbomb that can be armed by the wearer or an ally, starting a countdown. Users are recommended to remove the backpack before the countdown reaches zero.

LIFT-182 Warp Pack.description: A Dark Fluid-powered backpack that generates a portable micro-wormhole. This safe and well-understood technology allows the wearer to warp short distances. Warning: do not use while pack is overloaded.

AX/ARC-3 \"Guard Dog\" K-9.description: A humane, autonomous drone equipped with a modified Arc Thrower. Capable of projecting arcs of lightning through multiple targets. Does not need to recharge between shots.

E/AT-12 Anti-Tank Emplacement.description: A powerful manned gun emplacement, capable of taking out armored targets at long ranges.

TX-41 Sterelizer.description: Atomizes caustic chemicals into a fine mist that liquifies sensitive electronics and tissues. Blinds and slows most enemies.

GL-52 De-Escalator.description: A humane grenade launcher firing high-powered arc grenades.

S-11 Speargun.description: A speargun firing heavy-duty projectiles. These projectiles release a cloud of gas on impact, and must be carefully loaded one at a time.

EAT-700 Expendable Napalm.description: A single-use weapon that fires a missile containing napalm cluster bombs that release upon impact.

MS-11 Solo Silo.description: A silo that fits one single, powerful missile. Comes with a handheld targeting remote.

CQC-1 One True Flag.description: The eternal colors of Super Earth can never be tainted. Only quenched, by the blood of its enemies.

PLAS-45 Epoch.description: A powerful plasma weapon that fires one blast at a time, each blast exploding on impact. Must be charged to fire. Warning: do not overcharge.

A/FLAM-40 Flame Sentry.description: An automated flamethrower turret. Warning: fuel canister prone to explosion when ruptured.

A/LAS-98 Laser Sentry.description: A turret firing powerful and precise laser beams. Warning: overloading heat sink may cause adverse effects.

Resupply.description: A Hellpod containing four supply packs, to replenish personal ammunition and stims in the field.

Eagle Rearm.description: Order the Eagle Fighter to return to the ship, where it can restock its armaments.

Reinforce.description: A replacement for a fallen comrade.

SSSD Delivery.description: A Hellpod containing a Super Solid State Drive, the peak of secure data storage. Used by Helldivers for everything from transfer of patriotic data to the sabotage of enemy mainframes.

Hellbomb.description: The Hellbomb is a tactical nuke powerful enough to destroy any perceivable target in its blast zone. For safety and budgetary reasons, it has to be armed manually once deployed.

Super Earth Flag.description: The main ingredient in Super Earth liberation.

Prospecting Drill.description: An advanced, mostly self-operating prospecting drill fitted into a Hellpod. Handles soil sample extraction, analysis and data upload with minimal necessary input from an operator.

Seismic Probe.description: A Seismic Probe fitted into a Hellpod. Is preprogrammed so that only the simplest calibration and execution secuence is needed once deployed to the surface.

Orbital Illumination Flare.description: A flare that illuminates the battlefield.
